item.description:
Join us for a two-hour, hands-on workshop, where you will learn all about your beeswax (and other products of the honeybee hive, too!)

You will learn:

- amazing facts about the main products of the honeybee hive: honey, beeswax,
propolis, pollen, and royal jelly
- how and why these products are produced by the bees, and some of their
medicinal properties
- how to melt and filter raw honeycomb into useable beeswax
- simple recipes for using the products of the hive to make infused honey,
candles, and lip balm

* Taste infused honey and create lip-balm from an easy-tofollow recipe!

* Each participant will go home with a tube of their own lip balm!

WHERE: Agricultural Hall, 343 Amory Street, Jamaica Plain
WHEN: Saturday, June 15, 3pm-5pm
COST: $15
REGISTER HERE: http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/388877

for more information, visit:
www.thebenevolentbee.com
www.aghall.com
item.name: All About Your Beeswax!
